name: Quadrium 2
description:
Quadrium is back with a new and exciting mash-up of marble popper and match-3 challenge! Discover new bonuses and antibonuses and develop new strategies. Use mines to clear the field with explosive chain reactions and encounter fun boss battles that pit you against exciting challengers. Are you a fan of difficult puzzles? Select Challenge Mode at any time and put your skills to the test!

- Fun new bonuses and antibonuses
- Mighty boss battles
- Magnificent graphics and effects
- Play Relaxed or Challenge modes
